docs.lead_paragraph: PRESENTATION.--For the past five years, Mr. OLIVER H. LEE has been connected with the Hudson River Railroad. At first, he was Division Engineer, superintending the construction of the track. When the work was completed, he was chosen to superintend the running department of the Road, and, at a later period, he was elected Secretary of the Company. In each sta-
